resources.string: If you are using third-party camera applications, you might need to select a different resolution. Visit https://fairphone.com/camera-swap for more information.
Your main camera is now ready to be used.
Your front camera is now ready to be used.
Your main camera and front camera are now ready to be used.

plurals.name: camera_swap_notification_text
plurals.item: To make sure your new camera works optimally, please read these tips.
To make sure your new cameras work optimally, please read these tips.
